item.description: Enjoy an evening and meet new friends at this fun event. Every Tuesday "Its Ping Pong". Co-ed Doubles all levels followed by a social. 7:30pm to 9:30pm event fee $10. Tables, balls & paddles supplied. Tennis or sneakers required. At the Wethersfield United Methodist Church. 150 Prospect Street, Wethersfield, CT 06109. For more information www.meetup.com/New-England-Social-Sports-Adventurers. or Tom Lobo (c)# 860-729-6993.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Ping pong in Wethersfield
